channel.title: [PI] Epicscape 0.52
channel.description:
[B]Base:[/B] Project Insanity [B]Client:[/B] Nick's Emulation Client/Slashscape client
(Keep in mind that I didn't use the server released with the client, I only ripped things out of it.)
If someone can upload a mirror, that'd be greatly appreciated: [url=http://uppit.com/ndwefkg6w2ad/Epicscape_V0.52.rar]UppIT - Free File hosting - Epicscape V0.52.rar[/url]
[B]Features:[/B] Beginning Tutorial Island 99% Freaky Forester Random Event (It doesn't tell you to kill a random NPC though, just the four tailed one) 95% Cook's Assistant 40% Undead Army (Zombie Minigame) 60% Godwars Dungeon - uses the original KC npcs and stuff but teleports you to the actual map. Only Armadyl and Bandos working. 30% Warriors Guild - Item on object working and npc spawning PVP Area working (credits to Pim/ZRPS/Soul Split, used their high and low method) Sick donation method, how it works - It's pretty much like Deltascape's (the current advertised one) with the NPC talking and all. There's an NPC at home, if you talk to him, he'll tell you to donate at blah blah blah. If you have the donation integer set to something, then he'll give you an item instead.
Just remembered I made a video of it lol -
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fLiXPu1scc8]YouTube - clip0139[/url]
This wasn't made on Nick's emu client though, was a while ago.
Other features: Premium Shop PK points shop Deposit all items in inventory - Thanks to Nick Home Teleport with the animation and GFX - Thanks to Nick
Warriors Guild [IMG]http://content.imagesocket.com/images/4160.png[/img]
Undead Army [IMG]http://content.imagesocket.com/images/2978.png[/img]
Freaky Forester [IMG]http://content.imagesocket.com/images/n33d.png[/img]
And that's about everything worth mentioning. Epicscape is a pickup and pk server. You can't spawn certain items (Rare items and items above the ID 7000) and you must have 150 ePoints to spawn an item. Normal players get 50 ePoints every 2-3 minutes and moderators/donators/staff get 100. The server would still be the same if you were to remove pickup and all that crap though.
So yeah, have fun. :)

item.title: [PI] Epicscape 0.52
item.dc:creator: @irKevin irKevin
item.description:
@irKevin wrote:

Base: Project Insanity
Client: Nick’s Emulation Client/Slashscape client

(Keep in mind that I didn’t use the server released with the client, I only ripped things out of it.)

If someone can upload a mirror, that’d be greatly appreciated:
UppIT - Free File hosting - Epicscape V0.52.rar

Features:
Beginning Tutorial Island
99% Freaky Forester Random Event (It doesn’t tell you to kill a random NPC though, just the four tailed one)
95% Cook’s Assistant
40% Undead Army (Zombie Minigame)
60% Godwars Dungeon - uses the original KC npcs and stuff but teleports you to the actual map. Only Armadyl and Bandos working.
30% Warriors Guild - Item on object working and npc spawning
PVP Area working (credits to Pim/ZRPS/Soul Split, used their high and low method)
Sick donation method, how it works -
It’s pretty much like Deltascape’s (the current advertised one) with the NPC talking and all. There’s an NPC at home, if you talk to him, he’ll tell you to donate at blah blah blah. If you have the donation integer set to something, then he’ll give you an item instead.

Just remembered I made a video of it lol -

YouTube - clip0139

This wasn’t made on Nick’s emu client though, was a while ago.

Other features:
Premium Shop
PK points shop
Deposit all items in inventory - Thanks to Nick
Home Teleport with the animation and GFX - Thanks to Nick

Warriors Guild

Undead Army

Freaky Forester

And that’s about everything worth mentioning. Epicscape is a pickup and pk server. You can’t spawn certain items (Rare items and items above the ID 7000) and you must have 150 ePoints to spawn an item. Normal players get 50 ePoints every 2-3 minutes and moderators/donators/staff get 100. The server would still be the same if you were to remove pickup and all that crap though.

So yeah, have fun.

Read full topic
